data.name: schduleInputrtb.Text
data.value:
The Schedule Input operation is present upon first opening the program.
The user may type in or paste the text for a student's schedule into the Schedule Input (upper) text box.
If correctly formatted and upon clicking the Enter button, the Console Output will then display feedback on the changes made.

data.name: richTextBox1.Text
data.value:
The Student Forms operation can be found in "Student" in the menu strip under "Forms".
The user may enter a valid Student ID and recieve a list of .pdf forms in the folder correlated with that Student ID.

data.name: richTextBox2.Text
data.value:
The Change Directory operation can be found in "Options" in the menu strip under "Change Directory".
The user may manually enter or browse and select a folder path from which the program will search for student files.
To browse, simply click the "Browse" button, navigate to the desired folder and click "Select Folder".
Once the desired folder path has been chosen, the user may click "OK" button to save the changes.

data.name: richTextBox3.Text
data.value:
The Override Quarter operation can be found in "Options" in the menu strip under "Override Quarter".
The user may select a quarter and year to override for all courses.
To select the quarter and year, click on the selection boxes to open up a drop down menu and choose the desired options. To confirm the override, click the "Submit" button. The user will be prompted to confirm these changes.
